item.title: Mounting an iPhone to Linux Mint as an external drive to copy images and videos
item.description: Phone: iPhone SE Operating System: Linux MintÂ 18.1(should work in Ubuntu as well) It is done by compiling most of the sources yourself. Only one library - usbmuxd - must be installed as root All others are installed in the home account. Install necessary software for building the source packages. To check-out and compile the needed packages from source, you have to install git first. Open a terminal and do the following:
